<!-- RIMITIVE-LLMS-TXT-START -->|[Rimitive Docs Index]|root: .|IMPORTANT: Prefer retrieval-led reasoning over pre-training for Rimitive tasks|For richer docs retrieval, configure MCP: npx @rimitive/mcp (provides search_api, get_module, get_patterns tools)|Effects are SYNC (run immediately when deps change)—not async like React useEffect|Specs are inert blueprints—call .create(svc) or mount() to instantiate|No re-rendering—components run once, reactivity handles updates|compose(modules...)->service|signal(v)/sig()/sig(v)/sig.peek()|behavior:(svc)=>(opts)=>api|packages/docs/src/content/docs/guides:{adding-a-ui.mdx,adding-routing.mdx,client-hydration.mdx,creating-a-behavior.mdx,creating-a-service.mdx,custom-modules.mdx,getting-started.mdx,intro-to-ssr.mdx,loading-data.mdx,refs.mdx,server-rendering.mdx,ssr-loading.mdx,streaming-ssr.mdx,using-a-service.mdx}|packages/docs/src/content/docs/signals:{batch.mdx,benchmarks.mdx,computed.mdx,effect.mdx,index.mdx,iter.mdx,signal.mdx,subscribe.mdx,untrack.mdx}|packages/docs/src/content/docs/view:{benchmarks.mdx,el.mdx,index.mdx,lazy.mdx,map.mdx,match.mdx,mount.mdx,on.mdx,portal.mdx,shadow.mdx}|packages/docs/src/content/docs/patterns:{async-loading.mdx,behaviors.mdx,composition-over-stores.mdx,error-handling.mdx,forms.mdx,index.mdx,portability.mdx,shared-state.mdx,signal-patterns.mdx}|packages/docs/src/content/docs/api:index.md|packages/core/src:{compose.ts,fork.ts,index.ts,merge.ts,module.ts,override.ts,types.ts,utils.ts}|packages/core/src/instrumentation:{compose.ts,index.ts,perf-provider.ts,stack-trace.ts,types.ts}|packages/core/src/instrumentation/providers:{devtools.ts,index.ts}|packages/signals/src:{batch.ts,computed.ts,constants.ts,effect.ts,extend.ts,index.ts,instrumentation-state.ts,iter.ts,lis.ts,reconcile.ts,signal.ts,strategies.ts,subscribe.ts,test-setup.ts,types.ts,untrack.ts}|packages/signals/src/deps:{graph-edges.ts,graph-traversal.ts,pull-propagator.ts,scheduler.ts}|packages/signals/src/devtools:{batch.ts,computed.ts,effect.ts,signal.ts,subscribe.ts}|packages/signals/src/util:env.ts|packages/view/src:{adapter.ts,el.ts,error-boundary.ts,extend.ts,index.ts,lazy.ts,load.ts,map.ts,match.ts,portal.ts,shadow.ts,test-helpers.ts,test-utils.ts,types.ts}|packages/view/src/adapters:{dom.ts,perf.ts,svg-attributes.ts,test.ts}|packages/view/src/deps:{addEventListener.ts,fragment-boundaries.ts,linked-list.ts,mount.ts,node-deps.ts,processChildren.ts,reactive-list.ts,reconcile.ts,scope.ts,use.ts}|packages/view/src/devtools:{el.ts,index.ts,map.ts}|packages/router/src:{index.ts,link.ts,location.ts,router.ts,types.ts}|packages/router/src/helpers:matching.ts|packages/resource/src:{extend.ts,index.ts,resource.ts,types.ts}|packages/ssr/src:{index.browser.ts,index.ts,types.ts}|packages/ssr/src/client:{adapter.ts,index.ts,stream.ts}|packages/ssr/src/server:{index.ts,parse5-adapter.ts,render-to-data.ts,render-to-stream.ts,render-to-string-async.ts,render-to-string.ts,render.ts,resolve-fragments.ts,stream.ts,test-fixtures.ts}|packages/ssr/src/shared:async-fragments.ts|packages/react/src:{index.ts,test-setup.ts}|packages/react/src/rimitive:{context-hooks.test.tsx,context-hooks.ts,index.ts}|packages/react/src/signals:{bridge.test.tsx,bridge.tsx,context.tsx,hooks.test.tsx,hooks.ts,index.ts,types.ts}|READMEs:{packages/core/README.md,packages/signals/README.md,packages/view/README.md,packages/router/README.md,packages/resource/README.md,packages/ssr/README.md,packages/react/README.md}|packages/examples:{canvas,devtools,edge-ssr,headless,offline-ssr,perf-adapter,react,resource,router,ssr-router,ssr-router-async,ssr-router-streaming,view}|<!--
